acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in a shipment of court papers from Patrick County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Patrick County was formed in 1790 from Henry County.
The will book of Patrick County in this collection was created by the County Court.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Will Book, 1791-1823, of Patrick County Court. The will book includes the name of testator, list of heirs and the year the wills were proven in court and probate records such as inventories and appraisements. The will book has an index which contains the first and last names of both parties. It is arranged alphabetically from A-Z.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Patrick Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records On Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia web site.
